attributes.action: Fixed price on divorce, child arrangements and financial orders
attributes.additional_details:
Solicitors Are making money out of a families misery 

People with the biggest wallets drag out the cases to avoid courts 

Have a government run institution to run every case and control costs
attributes.background:
Control solicitors fees In family legal matters 

A fixed cost for families both petitioner and respondents to £5000

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

It is not a requirement to have a solicitor to get a divorce, and decisions about the cost of legal services are a matter for individual solicitors, not the UK Government or Parliament.
